text:
e="preserve">Angela Noelle Schrute (née Martin; formerly Lipton) is a fictional character from the US television series "The Office" played by American actress Angela Kinsey. She is an original character. She marries Dwight Schrute in the series. Martin is the head of the accounting department at the Scranton branch of the fictitious paper distribution company Dunder Mifflin.
Angela is often negative and frowns upon her coworkers all the time. She is a critic of Pam Beesley's and Jim Halpert's relationship.
